laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) panel and copy number analysis
laboratory_examinations.findings: Detected a homozygous likely pathogenic variant in the SYNE1 gene: NM_182961.4(SYNE1): c.9625A > T (p.Lys3209Ter), Chr6:152690632.
Sequencing and copy number variant assessment of an mtDNA PCR product covering all known pathogenic variants.
